finanzas.intro: This section annualises the net weekly saving and benchmarks it against projected FY2025 club revenues.
finanzas.footnote: Revenue source: Earnings Release Q3 FY2025 (Manchester United plc). Guidance range £660m–£670m.
finanzas.analysisTpl: A net weekly saving of {weeklySaving} annualises to {annualSaving} (x52). This equals {pctRevenue} of midpoint revenue (£{revMidM}m) and {pctEbitda} of midpoint EBITDA (£{ebitdaMidM}m). {qualifier}

qualifiers.marginal: Impact remains marginal at current scale.
qualifiers.meaningful: Represents a meaningful reinforcement of structural efficiency.
qualifiers.material: Indicates a material structural shift versus the prior cost base.
qualifiers.negative: A negative net figure reduces structural flexibility and requires offset elsewhere.
